column4: yeah it works, it seems they use there own player maybe you are blocking the content in some way??
!irssi
I'm looking for that possibility, but can't find where I might be blocking anything.   Any suggestions?
do u use anything like "noscript" or "Adblock"
also do you have the java and flash plugins installed in firefox correctly
maybe that's it ... I think I do ... but how can I check
about the java and flash plugins
yes
try playing a video from youtube thats a good way to check
YouTube works fine
ok, then you are sure there are no other firefox extensions that are for blocking content
what video player would I use to watch that?
it seems to be in there own player?? but i would suggest mplayer
sudo apt-get install mozilla-mplayer
already have that installed
ok, this is a weird one.... I wonder what could be missing
yes .... I'm looking for everything ... YouTube works great
CNN works great
I even got video to work on MSNBC
like you said ... this is so weird. I don't care about Fox news website that much, but now it's just the principle of the matter.  :-)
yeah I know
